title: BARTENDER Glass of God
overview: At Eden Hall, each glass has a story. A quiet bar lies tucked away in the streets of Tokyo, and it seems only the most desperate souls burdened by their own troubles manage to find its doors. But after a glass of God poured by the brilliant bartender Ryu, they leave renewed. Ryu has a giftâ€”he knows how to soothe the soul with the perfect drink. Who will he meet next?
